French: La science est la poursuite de la vérité.
English: Science is the pursuit of truth.

French: L'innovation est la clé du succès.
English: Innovation is the key to success.

French: Le progrès technique est la force motrice de l'humanité.
English: Technical progress is the driving force of humanity.

French: La biologie est la science de la vie.
English: Biology is the science of life.

French: L'astronomie est la recherche de l'univers.
English: Astronomy is the search for the universe.
